forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Monday

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low near 5C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 43F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.
